title: Creamy Tomato Pasta
instructions: Boil pasta. In another pan, heat oil, add garlic. Pour in tomato puree and cook 5 mins. Add cream, season. Mix pasta with sauce.

title: Garlic Butter Shrimp
instructions: Melt butter, sauté garlic. Add shrimp, cook till pink. Add lemon juice, season, sprinkle parsley.

title: Chickpea Buddha Bowl
instructions: In a bowl, layer quinoa, chickpeas, avocado slices, greens. Drizzle with tahini dressing.

title: Banana Pancakes
instructions: Blend bananas, oats, eggs, and baking powder. Pour batter on pan. Cook both sides till golden. Serve with syrup.

title: Vegan Tacos
instructions: Mix beans, corn, tomatoes. Fill taco shells. Top with avocado and lime juice. Serve chilled or warm.

title: Paneer Tikka
instructions: Mix curd with spices and marinate paneer for 1 hour. Skewer and grill/bake until golden.

title: Chicken Curry
instructions: Fry onions, add ginger garlic paste. Add tomatoes, spices, then chicken. Cook until chicken is tender. Add water for gravy.

title: Fruit Smoothie
instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth. Serve chilled.

title: Oats Porridge
instructions: Cook oats in milk for 5–7 mins. Add sweetener and top with fruits.

title: Masala Dosa
instructions: Prepare potato masala. Spread dosa batter on pan. Add filling and fold. Serve with chutney and sambar.
